altername_name: Pferd & Pony: Best Friends: Mein Pferd
Real Stories: Best Friends: My Horse
Real Stories: Best Friends: Mon Poulain, Mon Cheval
name: Let's Ride: Friends Forever
overview: Best friends forever! Every girl needs a best friend, and yours is your horse! Practice hard to perfect your riding and jumping skills as you prepare for the all-important regional jumping competitions. Go for the blue ribbon!
